data.title: Fresh Burst of Flavor!
data.body: ICE BREAKERS Ice Cubes chewing gum offers a refreshing burst of peppermint flavor that lasts. The sugar-free formula is perfect for freshening breath without any guilt, and the convenient pouch makes it easy to grab a piece on the go. Each gum cube delivers a satisfying crunch followed by a cooling sensation, making it a delightful treat after meals or between meetings. With 100 pieces per pouch, there's plenty to share with friends and family. A must-have for anyone who enjoys a fresh and invigorating chewing experience!
